loginText: We are glad to see you again! transfer and receive funds trusted by millions worldwide.
loginTextParagraphy: To get access to your account, please fill in your details.
forgotPasswdText2: enter the email associated with this account
home_main-paragraphy-text1: Send & Receive money to your loved ones in minutes with great rates and low fees. Over 50 countries and 23 currencies supported.
home_Hero1-paragraphy-text1: Quickly and easily send and receive funds within frica without hussle. Over 80 countries and 100 currencies supported.
home_Hero2-Title: The Secure, easiest and fastest way to transfer money.
content_unique_paragraph: Here’s Top 4 reasons why using our services is important to send and receive funds.
content_unique_ways1_text: Use the web online platform or the mobile apps on Google playstore and iOS.
content_unique_ways2_text: Get super fast payment upon confirmation of cash transfer or receiving cash.
content_unique_ways3_text: Move money online, in person, or any FirstBank branch and First MonieAgent.
content_unique_ways4_text: Transfer and Receive fund with our secure platform without any inconveniences.
Borderless_head: Borderless ways to use our services.
Borderless_text: Sending fund has now been made very easy without hussle. You can now receive fund by walk-in to any FirstBank branch. An existing and new customer can walk-in to any branch of FirstBank, Registered Financial Agent(POS & FirstMonie Agent) to transfer funds in any currency to a 3rd party bank Domiciliary account within minutes and to receive funds
ServiceWeCanOffer_title: What can you do with our new app?
ServiceWeCanOffer_subtext: You can enjoy our services we offer on-the-go from the comfort of your home.
Testimonials_subtext: A payments experience people love to talk about
Testimonials_1: “Easy to use, and reliable to use with the hussle of waiting in the queue.”
Testimonials_2: “It's a real good idea to manage your money. The rates are fair and you can carry out the transactions without worrying!
Testimonials_3: “I have used them twice now. Good rates, very efficient service”
Downloads_the_app_title: Download our app for the fastest, most convenient way to send & get Payment.
